verses.verse: יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> thou [art] my God אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you אֲרֽוֹמִמְךָ֙ <WH7426> exalt אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> thee I will praise שִׁמְךָ֔ <WH8034> thy name כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> for thou hast done פֶּ֑לֶא <WH6382> wonderful עֵצ֥וֹת <WH6098> [things thy] counsels מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> of old אֱמ֥וּנָה <WH530> [are] faithfulness אֹֽמֶן׃ <WH544> [and] truth

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שַׂ֤מְתָּ <WH7760> For thou hast made מֵעִיר֙ <WH5892> of a city לַגָּ֔ל <WH1530> an heap קִרְיָ֥ה <WH7151> city בְצוּרָ֖ה <WH1219> [of] a defenced לְמַפֵּלָ֑ה <WH4654> a ruin אַרְמ֤וֹן <WH759> a palace זָרִים֙ <WH2114> of strangers מֵעִ֔יר <WH5892> to be no city לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> it shall never לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִבָּנֶֽה׃ <WH1129> be built

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that יְכַבְּד֣וּךָ <WH3513> glorify עַם־ <WH5971> people עָ֑ז <WH5794> Therefore shall the strong קִרְיַ֛ת <WH7151> thee the city גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> nations עָרִיצִ֖ים <WH6184> of the terrible יִירָאֽוּךָ׃ <WH3372> shall fear

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיִ֨יתָ <WH1961> have been מָע֥וֹז <WH4581> For thou hast been a strength לַדָּ֛ל <WH1800> to the poor מָע֥וֹז <WH4581> a strength לָאֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> to the needy בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> in his distress ל֑וֹ מַחְסֶ֤ה <WH4268> a refuge מִזֶּ֙רֶם֙ <WH2230> from the storm צֵ֣ל <WH6738> a shadow מֵחֹ֔רֶב <WH2721> from the heat כִּ֛י <WH3588> For ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> when the blast עָרִיצִ֖ים <WH6184> of the terrible ones כְּזֶ֥רֶם <WH2230> [is] as a storm קִֽיר׃ <WH7023> [against] the wall

כְּחֹ֣רֶב <WH2721> as the heat בְּצָי֔וֹן <WH6724> in a dry place שְׁא֥וֹן <WH7588> the noise זָרִ֖ים <WH2114> of strangers תַּכְנִ֑יעַ <WH3665> Thou shalt bring down חֹ֚רֶב <WH2721> [even] the heat בְּצֵ֣ל <WH6738> with the shadow עָ֔ב <WH5645> of a cloud זְמִ֥יר <WH2158> the song עָֽרִיצִ֖ים <WH6184> of the terrible ones יַעֲנֶֽה׃ <WH6030> shall be brought low פ

וְעָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> make יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> shall the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> unto all people בָּהָ֣ר <WH2022> And in this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this מִשְׁתֵּ֥ה <WH4960> a feast שְׁמָנִ֖ים <WH8081> of fat things מִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <WH4960> a feast שְׁמָרִ֑ים <WH8105> of wines on the lees שְׁמָנִים֙ <WH8081> of fat things מְמֻ֣חָיִ֔ם <WH4229> full of marrow שְׁמָרִ֖ים <WH8105> of wines on the lees מְזֻקָּקִֽים׃ <WH2212> well refined

וּבִלַּע֙ <WH1104> And he will destroy בָּהָ֣ר <WH2022> in this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this פְּנֵֽי־ <WH6440> the face הַלּ֥וֹט ׀ <WH3875> of the covering הַלּ֖וֹט <WH3874> cast over עַל־ <WH5921> is over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> all people וְהַמַּסֵּכָ֥ה <WH4541> and the vail הַנְּסוּכָ֖ה <WH5259> that is spread עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> over all nations

בִּלַּ֤ע <WH1104> He will swallow up הַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> death לָנֶ֔צַח <WH5331> in victory וּמָחָ֨ה <WH4229> will wipe away אֲדֹנָ֧י <WH136> and the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3069> GOD דִּמְעָ֖ה <WH1832> tears מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from כָּל־ <WH3605> all פָּנִ֑ים <WH6440> from off all faces וְחֶרְפַּ֣ת <WH2781> and the rebuke עַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> of his people יָסִיר֙ <WH5493> shall he take away מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> from off all the earth כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken פ

וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> And it shall be said בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <WH430> Lo this [is] our God זֶ֛ה <WH2088> this קִוִּ֥ינוּ <WH6960> we have waited ל֖וֹ וְיֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נוּ <WH3467> for him and he will save זֶ֤ה <WH2088> This יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God קִוִּ֣ינוּ <WH6960> we have waited ל֔וֹ נָגִ֥ילָה <WH1523> for him we will be glad וְנִשְׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8055> and rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> in his salvation

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תָנ֥וּחַ <WH5117> rest יַד־ <WH3027> shall the hand יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּהָ֣ר <WH2022> For in this mountain הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְנָ֤דוֹשׁ <WH1758> shall be trodden down מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> and Moab תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> his place כְּהִדּ֥וּשׁ <WH1758> is trodden down מַתְבֵּ֖ן <WH4963> under him even as straw [בְּמֵי כ] (בְּמֹ֥ו <WH4325> waste ק) מַדְמֵנָֽה׃ <WH4087> of a manure

וּפֵרַ֤שׂ <WH6566> And he shall spread forth יָדָיו֙ <WH3027> his hands בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <WH7130> in the midst כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after יְפָרֵ֥שׂ <WH6566> spreadeth forth הַשֹּׂחֶ֖ה <WH7811> of them as he that swimmeth לִשְׂח֑וֹת <WH7811> [his hands] to swim וְהִשְׁפִּיל֙ <WH8213> and he shall bring down גַּֽאֲוָת֔וֹ <WH1346> their pride עִ֖ם <WH5973> together אָרְבּ֥וֹת <WH698> together with the spoils יָדָֽיו׃ <WH3027> of their hands

וּמִבְצַ֞ר <WH4013> And the fortress מִשְׂגַּ֣ב <WH4869> of the high fort חוֹמֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH2346> of thy walls הֵשַׁ֥ח <WH7817> shall he bring down הִשְׁפִּ֛יל <WH8213> lay low הִגִּ֥יעַ <WH5060> [and] bring לָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> to the ground עַד־ <WH5704> even עָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> [even] to the dust ס
